oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Jon Nite - 2017-07-15
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Jon Nite from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on July 15, 2017. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jon Nite;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in music / (01:09) Opening comments by Abi Tapia / (03:55) Opening comments by Jon Nite / (05:54) Comments about the next song / (07:12) Performs Whatever She’s Got / (10:31) Talks about the journey of the next song / (12:39) Performs Boy / (16:01) Tells story about his daughter and the next song / (18:16) Performs Break On Me / (21:00) Introduces his daughter Ashley / (21:27) Talks about the next song / (24:02) Performs We Were Us (Jon and Ashley) / (26:56) Talks about growing up in Texas, Dierks Bentley and next song / (30:00) Performs Tip It On Back / (33:10) Answers question about song creation and publishing / (34:10) Answers question about how he discovered songwriting / (35:26) Answers question about his first recorded song / (35:35) Answers question about the number of songs he's written / (35:52) Answers question about his writing inspirations / (36:34) Answers question about the future of songwriters /

(37:09) Answers question about writing songs for specific artists / (37:50) Answers question about his education / (38:28) Answers question about artists changing his songs / (38:59) Answers question about unidentified co-writer / (39:19) Answers unknown question / (39:53) Answers question about songs he likes / (40:15) Talks about next song / (41:53) Performs Beachin' / (44:41) Closing comments / (44:55) Walk-out music / (45:09) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Nite, Jon; Nite, Ashley;
